title: Aarya Emerald Blossom Studs - Chettu Kammalu
materials: approx. Center Stone) and White Diamonds (Round Brilliant Cut
features: These exquisite stud earrings feature a delicate floral design with intricate gold filigree work. The central Oval Emerald is prong-set, surrounded by a halo of sparkling diamonds, creating a captivating contrast. The Chettu Kammalu style features a leafy vine design, giving it a natural, organic feel. The Hyderabadi polish adds a lustrous shine, enhancing the overall appeal.
occasions: and contemporary events. Ideal for adding a touch of traditional elegance to modern outfits.
description: These 'Aarya Emerald Blossom Studs' blend traditional South Indian design with modern aesthetics. The use of high-quality emeralds and diamonds ensures lasting beauty and value. The intricate filigree work showcases exceptional craftsmanship. The lightweight design makes them comfortable for extended wear. These studs offer a unique combination of cultural heritage and contemporary style, making them a cherished addition to any jewelry collection.
